projects.title: Permit Coordination (m/f/d) DC North Sea
projects.description:
For our client, we are looking for an experienced Permit Coordination (m/f/d) to support large-scale offshore infrastructure projects in the North Sea. The role focuses on ensuring timely permitting processes, compliance with regulatory conditions, and effective coordination between technical departments, authorities, and external stakeholders.

Supervision of interfaces between 50Hertz departments: Permits (CPS) and Offshore (FO) for program execution Coordination and follow-up of resulting tasks...
skills: At least 5 years of experience as a Permit Compliance Engineer In-depth knowledge of the German Planfeststellungsverfahren (planning approval process) and monitoring of compliance with Planfeststellungsbeschluss and permit conditions Excellent command of German (C1 level) and English (minimum B2 level) Strong familiarity with German state and federal permitting authorities, including but not limited to: AfPE (Authority for Planning and Environmental Protection) BSH (Federal Maritime and Hydrographic Agency) GDWS (General Directorate for Waterways and Shipping) MEKUN (Ministry of Energy Transition, Climate Protection, Environment and Nature) LKN (State Agency for Coastal Protection, National Parks and Ocean Protection) WSV (Federal Waterways and Shipping Administration) Proficiency in QGIS, Google Earth Pro, MS PowerPoint, and Microsoft Office (Word, Excel)
